Header.Content: Verify if typical recharge from SIMFONICS subscriber(Initiate From SalesPerson ,Dpp amount Zero and chaneel ,feeFundSource option MainDistributor) is successful from POS channel with the prepaid distributor
Header.ExpectedResult: Typical Recharge request should be successfull and Field 39 should be updated with 00

Step.ExpectedResult: Open action should be performed on 'Mexico_ADMIN_URL'

Step.ActualResult: Click action is performed and Navige to 'Prepaid Movistar - Please enter your login'Page
Step.ExpectedResult: Click action should be performed and Navigate To 'Prepaid Movistar - Please enter your login'Page
'superadmin' should be displayed in LoginUserName_Admin field
'mxn' should be displayed in PasswordEdit_Admin field

Step.ActualResult: Click action is performed and Navige to 'Prepaid Movistar-Distributor Connections'Page
Step.ExpectedResult: Click action should be performed and Navigate To 'Prepaid Movistar-Distributor Connections'Page

Step.ActualResult: Click action is performed and Navige to 'Prepaid Movistar - View Distributors'Page
Step.ExpectedResult: Click action should be performed and Navigate To 'Prepaid Movistar - View Distributors'Page
'0000000286' should be displayed in PartnerContent_Admin field

Step.ActualResult: The value is stored in '0000000286 in the variable ParentDistributorId'
Step.Content: Store the value in '0000000286 in the variable ParentDistributorId'
Step.ExpectedResult: The value should be stored in '0000000286 in the variable ParentDistributorId'
'label=1' should be displayed in DistributorsLevelDropDown_Admin listbox

Step.ActualResult: Click action is performed and Navige to 'Prepaid Movistar - View Distributors'Page
Step.ExpectedResult: Click action should be performed and Navigate To 'Prepaid Movistar - View Distributors'Page

Step.ActualResult: Click action is performed Onlink=0000000286Link Navigate To 'Prepaid Movistar - Distributor Profile'Page
Step.ExpectedResult: Click Action should be performed and Navigate To 'Prepaid Movistar - Distributor Profile'Page

Step.ActualResult: Click action is performed Onlink=0000000286Link Navigate To 'Prepaid Movistar - Alter Distributor'Page
Step.ExpectedResult: Click Action should be performed and Navigate To 'Prepaid Movistar - Alter Distributor'Page
'label=No' should be displayed in isPrepaidDistributorDropdown_Admin listbox
'label=Yes' should be displayed in isPrepaidDistributorDropdown_Admin listbox

Step.ActualResult: 'Changing the distribuer prepaid to post paid' is displayed in Comments_Admin field
Step.Content: Enter Comments_Admin textbox with value 'Changing the distribuer prepaid to post paid'
Step.ExpectedResult: 'Changing the distribuer prepaid to post paid' should be displayed in Comments_Admin field

Step.ActualResult: 'Main Distributor' is displayed in FeeFundSourceDropDown_Admin listbox
Step.ExpectedResult: 'label=Main Distributor' should be displayed in FeeFundSourceDropDown_Admin listbox
'readProperty-MX_FeeSetName' should be displayed in FeeSetDropDown_Admin listbox
